summary: This module provides Metaflow integrations for AWS Step Functions, offering classes to define state machine components such as mapping, parallel branches, and pass-through steps, as well as high‑level interfaces to construct, serialize, deploy, schedule, and control Step Functions workflows.
business_intent: Allow Metaflow users to orchestrate data pipelines on AWS Step Functions, enabling scalable, serverless execution with support for map‑reduce style processing, parallelism, and automated deployment and management of state machines.
